branchCategory.name: VBAT
branchCategory.description: <p>The VBAT series tanks are designed to directly mate with VBA boosters to add a reservoir of higher pressure air to the system.  With such a reservoir of high pressure air, the booster is able to charge the system during periods of low demand.  Available in carbon or stainless steel, the tanks are available in four sizes from 5 to 38 liters in capacity.  Models are available to meet various regional pressure vessel regulations.</p>
